what: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
title: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
text: function creates HTML string display social media icons user details. designed used environments can render HTML content R Markdown documents Shiny applications.

title: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
code: social(   github_username = "Gchism94",   linkedIn_username = "greg-chism",   web_link = "gregtchism.com",   github_icon = "&#xf09b",   linkedIn_icon = "&#xf08c",   web_icon = "&#xf0ac",   bg_col = "#fefefe",   icon_col = "#006199",   text_col = "#006199",   body_font = "roboto" )

title: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
text: github_username GitHub username (default: "Gchism94"). linkedIn_username LinkedIn username (default: "greg-chism"). web_link Personal professional website link (default: "gregtchism.com"). github_icon HTML character entity GitHub icon (default: "&#xf09b"). linkedIn_icon HTML character entity LinkedIn icon (default: "&#xf08c"). web_icon HTML character entity generic web icon (default: "&#xf0ac"). bg_color Background color HTML div (default: "#fefefe"). icon_color Color icons (default: "#006199"). font_color Color text (default: "#006199"). font_family Font family text (default: "roboto").

title: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
text: HTML string representing formatted social media details.

title: Generate Social Media HTML Caption — social
code:
social(github_username = "YourGitHub", linkedIn_username = "YourLinkedIn", web_link = "YourWebsite.com") #>

#>  #> YourGitHub
#>  #> YourLinkedIn
#>  #> YourWebsite.com #>
